definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: Various pickled fruits and vegetables make traditional popular dishes.
sentences.chinese: 各式凉果和腌制蔬菜都是传统名菜。

sentences.english: Jiaji Duck is one of the four famous Hainan dishes, which is popular with people in Qionghai.
sentences.chinese: 嘉积鸭是海南四大名菜之一，深受琼海人喜欢。

sentences.english: West Lake Water Shield Soup is also called "Chicken, Ham and Water Shield Soup", and it is the traditional Hangzhou famous Food.
sentences.chinese: 西湖莼菜汤又称鸡火莼菜汤，是杭州的传统名菜。

sentences.english: This is a famous Yunnan dish—steam-pot chicken.
I can recommend the vegetable pie - it's the specialty of the house.
sentences.chinese: 我推荐一道蔬菜馅饼，它是这家餐馆的名菜。

sentences.english: Wild City hundred famous when people can and Hengyang Zero Distance "face to face"?
sentences.chinese: 雁城百道名菜何时方能与衡阳百姓零距离“面对面”？

sentences.english: Squid has long been featured on the menus of Oriental and Mediterranean restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 东方和地中海饭店菜单上一直有只名菜叫目鱼。

sentences.english: How about"blanched chicken"(8)? It is a famous dish in Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: “白切鸡”怎么样，它是广州的一道名菜。

sentences.english: Ningbo famous dishes have distinct features.
sentences.chinese: 宁波名菜具有鲜明的特色。

sentences.english: This food is a Sichuan specialty. Help yourself， please.
sentences.chinese: 这是四川名菜，请大家不必客气。

sentences.english: This food is a Sichuan speciality. Help yourself， please.
sentences.chinese: 这是四川名菜，请大家不必客气。

sentences.english: One famous Basque staple is salt cod ("bacalao").
sentences.chinese: 巴斯克的名菜之一是咸鳕鱼。

sentences.english: Mee goreng is a dish famous in Indonesia, Malaysia, and Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 印度炒面是印尼，马来西亚和新加坡的一道名菜。

sentences.english: Huaiyang also many dishes in this historical period was born.
sentences.chinese: 众多淮扬名菜也就在这个历史时期诞生了。

sentences.english: Fish baked in pastry is the speciality of this restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 鱼馅饼是非家餐馆的名菜。

definition: signature dish/a restaurant’s most famous dish
lit. Buddha jumps over the wall, name for a Chinese dish that uses many non-vegetarian ingredients
stir-fried pork, favorite of Northern Song writer Su Shi 蘇軾|苏轼, a.k.a. Su Dongpo 蘇東坡|苏东坡
to smell, look and taste great
